name: Five Nights With Firearms
description:
THIS IS FIVE NIGHTS WITH FIREARMS


After countless nights, the nightguard have had enough of the never-ending jumpscares in his office... so he decides to take matters into his own hands and take the fight directly to his worst nightmares! Become him and defeat all of the animatronics of FNaF 1 (bonnie, chica, foxy, freddy and golden freddy) with each one being harder to beat than the last! If you like hard challenges, like in souls games , (and memes),then this game is definitely for you!

TAKE REVENGE

  • Shoot 8 guns at once
  • Fight all 5 animatronics
  • Adapt and learn the animatronics' attack patterns
  • Develop strategies to overcome them
  • Push your instincts to avoid their attacks
  • Defeat all the animatronics
  • Restore peace in Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria

THE FIGHT BEGINS

Are you strong enough to beat all 5 nightmares? No one knows, but one thing's for certain, the fight is going to be written in history books.
